name: Penguin Madness
description:
Welcome to Penguin Madness!

It's the game that will make you go mad!

Avoid the obstacles to reach the finnish line. Other types of obstecles will appear as you progress. What more do you need to know? Let's jump right in!

Coming in future updates:
  • More levels with other themes!
  • New characters to unlock!
  • Sound!

I would also love to hear what you want in the game! Comment down below.
